name: ldogfunc
label: ldogFunc: functional pre-processing for the LDOG project
description: This gear performs preprocessing of the functional scans for the LDOG project.

fMRIScoutAP.description: Scout EPI with AP encoding direction

fMRIScoutPA.description: Scout EPI with PA encoding direction

interpolationTarget.description: Target for the fmri interpolation. Use this if you passed a custom template to ldogstruct

saveIntermediateFiles.description: saves intermediate files created during the analysis

totalReadoutTimeAP.description: total readout time of the single-rep recon api in AP direction. Required for topup. Can be found in nifti header

totalReadoutTimePA.description: total readout time of the single-rep recon api in PA direction. Required for topup. Can be found in nifti header

useTheFirstTRforRegistration.description: Use the first tr instead of mean image for the first level registration

scoutRegistration.description: Do an initial rigid registration to the scout image. If both AP and PA scouts are passed, the target is the topuped scout image

author: Ozenc Taskin
